FuncDef: The display mpls te p2mp tunnel-interface command displays information about a P2MP TE tunnel interface.
CLIs: display mpls te p2mp tunnel-interface [ [ [ <interface-type> <interface-number> ] | <tunnelName> ] [ s2l-destination <leaf-addr> ] ]
display mpls te p2mp tunnel-interface auto-tunnel [ <auto-tunnel-name> ] [ s2l-destination <leaf-addr> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the tunnel name.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the IP address of a leaf node.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the name of an automatic P2MP TE tunnel.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls te p2mp tunnel-interface Tunnel 10
Admin State         : UP                Oper State   : UP
Main LSP State      : UP                LSP ID        : 7
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After P2MP RSVP-TE is enabled, the display mpls te p2mp tunnel-interface command can be configured on an ingress to display whether a P2MP TE tunnel is established. This command also displays information about a P2MP TE tunnel, including the addresses and status of leaf nodes.
The display mpls te p2mp tunnel-interface command takes effect only on the ingress. If it is configured on the other nodes, no information is displayed.
